name: The Quest to Defend Some Grass
name_original: The Quest to Defend Some Grass
description:
Your mom told you to touch some grass a while ago. After you found that grass, you embraced the moment and brought a handful of foliage home with you. Unfortunately, a horde evil beasts caught wind of the grass and are preparing to hunt you down. It is time to show your mettle and defend that grass!

Use WASD to Move and use your Mouse to aim and Shoot!
